tooltip.relics.researching.info: [Shift] キーを押してリサーチする...
tooltip.relics.researching.badge.ability: この能力は忘却の効果下では機能しない。
この能力は沈黙の効果下では機能しない。
能力は完璧なパラメーターに達している。自分に誇りを持て！
この能力は使用すると即座に発動する。
この能力は使用後一定時間持続し、繰り返し使用することで中断することができる。
この能力は、継続的に使用した場合にのみ機能する。
この能力は、使用時にオン／オフを切り替えることができる。
この能力は、周期的に使用すると即座に発動する。結果は使用期間に依存する。
能力は、使用するたびに循環するいくつかのモードを持っている。
tooltip.relics.researching.badge.relic.f: 傷のない完璧なレリック
遺物は完璧なパラメータに達している。誇りを持て！
tooltip.relics.researching.research.tip: 能力を解除するには、霧の下に隠れている星を、できあがった星座が背景のイメージと一致するようにつなげる必要がある。星座が正しく揃うと、能力は自動的に研究される。
tooltip.relics.researching.research.hint: コスト: %1$s エクスペリエンスレベル %2$s.
[Shift]キーを押すと、アビリティーリサーチが自動で行われる
そのアビリティーはすでに研究されている
tooltip.relics.researching.badge.ability: アクティブ、アビリティメニューを呼び出すには、インターフェイスの外で[%1$s]キーを押す。
tooltip.relics.researching.general.level: レベルアップポイント:
レリックをレベルアップすると獲得でき、能力をアップグレードするために使用される。
tooltip.relics.researching.general.playe: エクスペリエンスレベル:
プレイヤーの経験値。モブを倒したり、鉱石を採掘したり、アイテムを精錬したりすることで獲得できる。
ランダムなレリックのステータスのリロールに失敗するたびに獲得され、次のリロールでより良いステータスを獲得する可能性が高まる。運の 25% ごとに、リロールコストが1エクスペリエンスレベル増加する。
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.card.lo: ロックを解除するにはレリックを%1$sレベルまで上げる必要があります
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.card.no: アビリティーにはアップグレード可能なステータスがなく、レリックの状態に影響を与えない
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.card.un: 使うにはリサーチしてください
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.card.re: アビリティーのロックを解除できます %1$sあとクリックで解除
アビリティーをアップグレードできます
tooltip.relics.researching.general.extra: [Shift]キーを押して詳しい情報を見る
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.info.qu: レリッククオリティー:
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.info.ex: レリッククオリティーは、現在ロック解除されているすべての能力の品質の算術平均であり、0.5 刻みで 1 から 5 までのポイントで測定される。これは、アイテムの初期のランダム特性が可能な限り最高のものにどれだけ近いかを示す、視覚的な指標。レリックの全体的な品質を向上させるには、各能力を個別に考慮する必要がある。
tooltip.relics.researching.relic.experie: レリックエクスペリエンス:
レリックの能力を本来の目的通りに使用したり、他のレリックから経験値を獲得したりすることで獲得できる。最大経験値に達すると、レリックレベルとレベルアップ ポイントが 1 増加し、これまで利用できなかった能力のロックを解除したり、既存の能力をアップグレードしたりできるようになる。
アビリティークオリティー:
アビリティークオリティーはレリッククオリティーと同様に、能力の現在の特性すべての算術平均であり、0.5 刻みで 1 から 5 までのポイントで測定される。これは、能力の初期のランダム特性が可能な限り最高の特性にどれだけ近いかを示す、視覚的な指標。能力の品質を向上させるには、より良い値が得られるまでランダム特性をリセットする必要がある。
tooltip.relics.relic.upgrade.cost: コスト: %1$sレベルアップポイント%2$s, %3$sエクスペリエンスエベル%4$s。
tooltip.relics.relic.upgrade.locked: 能力が最大レベルに達した。
tooltip.relics.relic.upgrade.quick: [Shift]キーを押したままにすると、最高レベルにアップグレードされる。
tooltip.relics.relic.reroll.description: ステータスをランダムリロールする
tooltip.relics.relic.reroll.cost: コスト: %1$sエクスペリエンスレベル %2$s。
tooltip.relics.relic.reroll.quick: [Shift]キーを押したままにすると、ランダムなステータスが完璧な値にリロールされる。
tooltip.relics.relic.reroll.warning: [Shift]キーを押したままにすると、完璧な値から他のランダムな値へのステータスのリロールが確定する。
tooltip.relics.relic.reset.description: レベルポイントをリセット
tooltip.relics.relic.reset.cost: コスト:%1$sエクスペリエンスレベル%2$s.
tooltip.relics.relic.reset.locked: 使用するには、この能力を少なくとも1回はレベルアップする必要がある。
item.relics.infinity_ham: インフィニティーハム
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.description: 能力«再生»によって食べたピースごとに経験値がプラス1される
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.ability.auto: レリックを使用すると、ピースが一つ消費されプレイヤーの食糧ゲージが回復する。
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.ability.infu: インベントリ内のレリックにポーションを使用すると、ポーションを消費することでその効果が定着する。その後に「再生」能力を使用すると、定着したポーションの効果が付与される。チャージがない場合、レリックはポーションの特性を失う。
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.description: +アビリティ 「エンド・トランスポジション」を使用した場合、使用時の対象までの距離が10ブロックごとに+1経験点。
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.ability.neutr: Makes endermen neutral to the wearer.
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.ability.swap: エンド・トランスポジション
Swaps the wearer with the target along the line of sight.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.description: Grants the wearer the ability to turn enemy healing against them.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.belie: A toggleable ability with two modes: Sanctity and Unholiness. Activating the ability in any mode fills the internal buffer by 1 unit. In Sanctity mode, redirects a portion of the bearer's healing as damage to nearby targets and reduces incoming damage by 1% per charge. In Unholiness mode, absorbs a portion of the healing of nearby targets and increases damage dealt by 1% per charge.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.repen: Burns the health of nearby undead.
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.bless: Grants the bearer temporary invincibility upon activation, consuming charges from the relic's internal buffer each second.
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.description: +1 experience point for each use of the «Wormhole» ability, +1 experience point for every 50 blocks to the teleportation point.
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.ability.tele: Upon using, teleports the wearer to their respawn point.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.description: +1 experience point for every 2 glaive bounces from the «Blind Justice» ability.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.ability.gla: Usage releases one of 8 glaive charges, bouncing between nearby targets. The missing charges are restored themselves after a certain amount of time.
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.ability.saw: Usage consumes all 8 glaive charges, summoning a saw that deals damage to nearby targets. Reuse will return the saw to the wearer, restoring all charges. Automatic charge regeneration is blocked while the ability is active.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.description: +1 experience point for every 10 blocks to the target hit by the shot.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.rece: Shooting primarily uses arrows from the quiver's internal storage. Pressing the LMB with arrow on the quiver in the inventory will place it in the internal storage of the relic. Pressing the RMB on the quiver will get the last stack of arrows placed in it.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.leap: Knocks the player away from the looking direction, inflicting a vanishing effect until landing. Using a bow will suspend the player in mid-air, increasing damage and nullifying gravity for the next critical shot.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.agil: Increases the speed of bowstring tension.
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.rain: Calls on a point along the line of sight an area of falling homing arrows from the internal quiver storage from the «Arrow Storage» ability. The arrows themselves from the storage are not consumed. Only one area from this ability can exist at a time.
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.description: +1 experience point for every 5 seconds of flight within the scope of the ability «Eternal Fire».
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.ability.bon: Using a relic on a block will create a restricted flight zone, the size of which depends on the amount of fire in a certain radius around the center.
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.descriptio: +1 experience point for every 10 seconds of burning fuel when placing it in the internal buffer of the relic from the ability «Acceleration».
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.ability.bo: Using any combustible fuel on a relic in the inventory replenishes its internal buffer. Using the ability during the flight on an elytra rushes the wearer forward, consuming fuel from the internal buffer.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.description: +1 experience point for every 2 units of damage when attacking while being invisible from the «Disappearing» ability.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.van: Gives the wearer complete invisibility and increases the speed of their movement at a sufficiently low light level.
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.bac: An attack from the «Vanish» ability deals increased damage, outlining a circle around the target and dispelling the invisibility effect of the wearer. Reuse of the «Vanish» ability is possible only after the wearer leaves the circle.
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.descr: +1 experience point for every 10 damage accumulated in the internal buffer of the relic from the ability «Infernal Hatred».
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.abili: Accumulates the damage received by the wearer into the internal buffer of the relic. 5 seconds after the last damage or in case of a buffer overflow, the relic explodes, throwing obsidian fragments in all directions, causing damage and stunning targets.
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.descri: +1 experience point for each activation of the ability «Electric Discharge».
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.abilit: The wearer does not sink in water.
Deals damage to targets when colliding with them.
When the ability is triggered, «Electric Discharge» imposes a paralysis effect on the target.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.description:
+1 experience point for each spore released by the «Poison Synthesis» ability.
+1 experience point for each additional spore split by the «Decomposition» ability.
When taking damage, throws a spore in a random direction that sticks to surfaces and explodes when a target approaches, dealing damage, poisoning, slowing, and blocking healing for 5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.buffer: Each time the «Poison Synthesis» ability cooldown triggers, accumulates one charge into the relic's internal buffer that can be used by other abilities to release spores. Adds a chance not to consume spores from the internal buffer when requesting charges for other abilities.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.multip: Each spore can split into several smaller spores within a given range when it explodes. The maximum number of spores is determined by the degree of the main spore size, but the final number is limited by the first unsuccessful chance of spore division.
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.explos: Empties the relic's buffer, releasing all accumulated spore charges into the world. The size of the released spores depends on the wearer's missing health.
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.description: +1 experience point for every 3 blocks in the fall before triggering the ability «Earthquake».
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.ability.susta: Increases the speed of falling, increases the knockback resistance and negates slippering.
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.ability.impac: Using the ability in a fall will create a shockwave at the landing site, causing damage and throwing away nearby targets. Power of the wave depends on the distance that the wearer has flown.
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.description:
+1/5/10 experience point for each killed Zombified Piglin / Piglin / Piglin Brute.
+1 experience point for each additional trade from the ability «Respect».
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.comp: Makes piglins neutral in relation to the wearer. The nearest piglin will indicate the location of a bastion nearby.
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.trad: Each trade with piglins gets a multiple chance of 50% to issue an additional trading result.
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.description: +1 experience point for every 25 blocks overcome by a horse called by the ability «Portable Stall».
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.ability.paddo: Using a relic on the horse will move the animal to the internal storage. Reuse will release the creature. If the distance between the wearer and the summoned horse exceeds 16 blocks, it will automatically fit back into the flute.
A horse placed in the internal storage will slowly restore health.
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.description: +1 experience point for every 5 units of heating from the ability «Fiery Tread».
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.ability.pace: For a certain amount of time allows you to walk on the lava surface without falling and taking damage. After the time limit expires, the boots begin to overheat and cause damage to the wearer proportional to the degree of overheating.
tooltip.relics.aqua_walker.description: +1 experience point for every 5 units of getting wet from the ability «Moisture Resistance».
tooltip.relics.aqua_walker.ability.walki: For a certain amount of time allows you to move on the surface of the water without falling. After the time limit expires, the boots begin to sink, dragging the wearer with them under the water.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.description: +1 experience point for each level of enchantment «Riptide» on the trident when using it.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.slot: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipping relics.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.anch: Reduces the swimming speed and increases the sinking speed of the wearer.
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.ript: Allows you to use the trident «Riptide» ability without rain or water, adding recharge time to it.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.description: +1 experience point for each attack made by the wearer's pet.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.ability.slots: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipping relics.
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.ability.train: Increases the damage inflicted by the wearer's pets.
tooltip.relics.leather_belt.description: +1 experience point for each experience gained by equipped charms.
tooltip.relics.leather_belt.ability.slot: Increases the maximum number of slots for equipping relics.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.description:
+1 experience point for every 3 charges from the ability «Berserker Rage» when they are reset.
+1 experience point for each target hit by the «Spurt» ability.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.rage.d: Each wearer attack made within 3 seconds after the last one accumulates 1 charge into the internal buffer of the relic. The damage inflicted and received by the wearer, as well as its movement speed and dealt damage increases in proportion to the accumulated charges. After 3 seconds, the internal buffer of the relic is emptied, canceling all bonuses received.
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.phlebo: Increases the wearer's attack and movement speed, as well as granting passive regeneration proportional to the percentage of the missing health.
Dashes towards the direction of sight, setting enemies on fire, applying bleeding and attacking each target in its path with the item in the hand. Deals additional damage proportional to the number of charges in the relic's internal buffer from the «Berserker's Rage» ability and devastates it.
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.description: +1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the ability «Skating».
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.skatin: Increases the movement speed while on ice depending on the duration of sliding.
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.ram.de: When colliding with targets, deals damage proportional to the duration of «Skating» ability usage.
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.descriptio:
+1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the «Fins» ability.
+1 experience point for every second of acceleration from the «Slipping» ability.
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.ability.sw: Accelerates the swimming speed depending on its duration.
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.ability.sl: Increases movement speed in the rain depending on its duration.
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.ability.gi: Grants player the ability to not consume air while underwater.
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.description: +1 experience point for each second of return from the ability «Time rift».
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.ability.seal: When used, returns the wearer along the route traveled after a certain amount of time. Repeated use will terminate the ability.
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.descript: +1 experience point for every 10 blocks to the teleportation point from the «Teleportation Control» ability.
Using the chorus fruit teleports the wearer to the block along the line of sight within reach.
tooltip.relics.wool_mitten.description: +1 experience point for every 5 units of size when hit by a snowball from the ability «Mold».
Collecting snow using RMB with an empty hand gradually forms special solid snowballs. Hitting such a snowball on the target will cause damage and stun it, as well as freeze targets nearby. Holding a snowball without an equipped relic also freezes the wearer.
tooltip.relics.roller_skates.description: +1 experience point for each second of acceleration from the ability «Acceleration».
tooltip.relics.roller_skates.ability.ska: Increases the movement speed depending on its duration. All blocks become slippery for the wearer.
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.descripti: +1 experience point for each created portal if there is no existing one
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.ability.d: Holding RMB creates a portal on a point along the line of sight, stopping holding RMB creates a second portal using the same principle, linking it to the first one. Bringing a living creature to one of the portals will move it to the linked portal. Portals don't work if there are any solid blocks in their path.
tooltip.relics.phantom_boot.description: Condenses matter beneath the feet of the relic's owner, forging a path through any space, even where there is no solid ground.
tooltip.relics.phantom_boot.ability.brid: When the ability is active, a temporary phantom bridge forms beneath the player's feet, allowing the relic's owner to traverse it. The bridge possesses the properties of slippery and bouncy blocks, fully absorbing fall damage. If the player stands still on the bridge for too long, they will fall through and will be unable to climb back up until they stand on solid ground.
tooltip.relics.springy_boot.description: Grants the relic owner a special bounciness, allowing them to bounce off any solid surface.
tooltip.relics.springy_boot.ability.boun: When the ability is active, all solid blocks gain bounciness, allowing the player to bounce off them when falling. Upon activation, the player is launched into the air with a force based on the current bounciness.
command.relics.base.not_relic: The item in hand must be a relic!
info.relics.researching.wrong_container: Working with the relic in this inventory is not possible. Move item to the player's main inventory and try again.
